sqlMap.statement:
SELECT T.ORGANKEY, SUM(T.SUM_MOUNT) AS SUM_MOUNT, SUM(T.CASE_02) AS CASE_02, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_02) AS TRANS_DC_02, SUM(T.AMT_DC_02) AS AMT_DC_02, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_02) AS TRANS_FC_02, SUM(T.AMT_FC_02) AS AMT_FC_02, SUM(T.CASE_03) AS CASE_03, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_03) AS TRANS_DC_03, SUM(T.AMT_DC_03) AS AMT_DC_03, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_03) AS TRANS_FC_03, SUM(T.AMT_FC_03) AS AMT_FC_03, SUM(T.CASE_04) AS CASE_04, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_04) AS TRANS_DC_04, SUM(T.AMT_DC_04) AS AMT_DC_04, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_04) AS TRANS_FC_04, SUM(T.AMT_FC_04) AS AMT_FC_04, SUM(T.CASE_05) AS CASE_05, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_05) AS TRANS_DC_05, SUM(T.AMT_DC_05) AS AMT_DC_05, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_05) AS TRANS_FC_05, SUM(T.AMT_FC_05) AMT_FC_05 FROM T07_INREP_BS_LEVEL T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
T.STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt_start#
T.STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
GROUP BY T.ORGANKEY order by T.ORGANKEY

SELECT COUNT(distinct T.ORGANKEY) FROM T07_INREP_BS_LEVEL T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ORGANKEY in $organkey$
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
T.STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt_start#
T.STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#

SELECT SUM(T.SUM_MOUNT) AS SUM_MOUNT, SUM(T.CASE_02) AS CASE_02, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_02) AS TRANS_DC_02, SUM(T.AMT_DC_02) AS AMT_DC_02, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_02) AS TRANS_FC_02, SUM(T.AMT_FC_02) AS AMT_FC_02, SUM(T.CASE_03) AS CASE_03, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_03) AS TRANS_DC_03, SUM(T.AMT_DC_03) AS AMT_DC_03, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_03) AS TRANS_FC_03, SUM(T.AMT_FC_03) AS AMT_FC_03, SUM(T.CASE_04) AS CASE_04, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_04) AS TRANS_DC_04, SUM(T.AMT_DC_04) AS AMT_DC_04, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_04) AS TRANS_FC_04, SUM(T.AMT_FC_04) AS AMT_FC_04, SUM(T.CASE_05) AS CASE_05, SUM(T.TRANS_DC_05) AS TRANS_DC_05, SUM(T.AMT_DC_05) AS AMT_DC_05, SUM(T.TRANS_FC_05) AS TRANS_FC_05, SUM(T.AMT_FC_05) AMT_FC_05 FROM T07_INREP_BS_LEVEL T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ORGANKEY in $organkey$
T.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
T.STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt_start#
T.STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
